response.job_title: Electrical engineer, tunnels, highway and intelligent transport sistems
response.summary: Experienced Technical Project Manager in the transportation in tunnels and highways. Skilled in AutoCAD, Microsoft Excel, Engineering, and Strategic Planning. Strong program and project management professional with a Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech.) focused in Electrical Engineering from universidad Nacional de Colombia
response.skills: Construcción, Ingeniería de proyectos, Capacidad de análisis, Metodologías ágiles, Análisis de requisitos, Electrical Engineering, Project Planning, Project Management, Engineering, Research, Strategic Planning, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, Team Leadership

profile_positions.description: Responsible for monitoring the execution of work by the client and the client's subcontractors, as well as its own partners and subcontractors. During the planning, locating, staking, installation and commissioning stages of the ITS. In the Sinifana, Amagá and Mulatos tunnels.
profile_positions.title: Senior Site Manager

profile_positions.description:
Technical responsible for the execution of the concessions Costera Barranquilla - Cartagena and Ruta al Mar Caucasia - Montería - Arboletes - Cruz del Viso, in the departments of Antioquia, Córdoba, Cesar and Bolivar Colombia. Main responsibilities:
● Execute the project based on the client's requirements and PM@Siemens' guidelines on time, within budget and according to the required quality
● Lead project teams and direct subject matter experts, support functions and third party partners to implement client projects and achieve project objectives
● Interact and communicate with clients on all issues, risks and opportunities related to the project
● It makes a detailed planning of the work packages, the necessary resources and the schedule. Organizes and monitors the interface, requirements and configuration management
● Ensures that the technical, time, commercial and qualitative objectives of the projects are met in accordance with the guidelines
● Defines the technical measurement criteria and control factors of the project
● Identifies early deviations in the project and the causes of the problem and proposes sustainable solutions
● Directing customer-facing activities (customer interviews, question and answer sessions, project milestone meetings, design approvals, final acceptance procedures) from project start to final acceptance.
profile_positions.title: Technical Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Detail Engineering and the execution of the works in the sector of annexed works, Project Double Roadway Crossing Central Mountain Range, tunnel La Linea. The design activities of the road project are carried out based on the following responsibilities:
● Works budget.
● Regulations Retie NTC 2050
● Creation of designs, plans and typical assembly
● To make offers, tenders for medium and low voltage works, electro bars, concentrated measurement, control of lighting in tunnels and their substations
● To carry out field visits if required or at the request of the client for the presentation of estimates.
● To deliver the awarded projects to the execution area in order to verify the scope of the offer and delivery times to the final client.
profile_positions.title: Senior Infrastructure Engineer

company.name: Consorcio Túneles al Pacífico (DISICO, GYC, INSI y 1 SOLUTION),

profile_positions.description: Double roadway Cisneros Loboguerrero, Valle del Cauca. Participation from the beginning of the execution elaborating designs and plans, the selection of materials and the enlistment of personnel, equipment and tools. The execution until the integrated delivery to the audit office. The project included substations, lighting, ventilation systems and ITS. A total of 8 Substations, 3 MVA, 8 tunnels, total 3.3 km, 2 km of lighted track, 20 fans were executed.
profile_positions.title: Electro Mechanical Engineer Site Manager

profile_positions.description: As an electrical engineer assisting the administrative area in the construction of the electrical component of the DANE infrastructure plan. In the topics of infrastructure, 2 sub headquarters were adapted (Valledupar and Santa Marta), the remodeling of the 3rd floor of the North wing of the Central DANE was designed. A pilot energy-saving programme was developed in DANE Central with results in savings of 30% in monthly consumption.
profile_positions.title: Senior Infrastructure Engineer

profile_positions.description: Cáqueza, Quetame and Guayabetal Cundinamarca. for the execution of the first third of the work, sector 3 and 3a. The work was executed with installation, energization and protocols until the final reception from the client COVIANDES. The activities executed and all the equipment were included in the SCADA system, which allows for constant control and supervision of the road. A total of 6 substations were built, 6 MVA, 7 tunnels, a total of 3.5 kilometers, 14 kilometers of lighted track, and 40 fans.
profile_positions.title: Site Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Company that is in charge of the bids towards part of the GRUPO INTERNACIONAL DE ELÉCTRICOS, at the moment it is an independent company. Most of the contracts are awarded at state level, and developed throughout the Colombian geography. To emphasize solar project of 2.66 KW for natural national parks of Colombia.

company.name: COMSA Corporación
company.description:
COMSA Corporación is the largest unlisted Spanish group in the infrastructure and engineering sector. Founded in 1891, it is specialized in the construction and maintenance of road and rail transport networks, buildings, hydraulic, port and airport works, as well as in the design and execution of facilities for the industrial sector. Additionally, it offers renewable energy services.

Currently, the group has a turnover of more than 1,000 million euros, manages a workforce over 7,700 employees and is present in 25 countries.

location.raw: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Canary Islands, Spain
